QuestData.Title: Assault on Violet Hold: Purple Pain
QuestData.Description:
Again! It happened again!
Sure, it's the Legion that staged the prison breakout this time, but I *told* them it was a bad idea to keep some of the most dangerous beings on Azeroth in a prison inside our city!
We can talk about relocating later, I suppose. Right now, we've got some... pacification to tend to.
Can you help?
QuestData.LogDescription: Repel the Assault on Violet Hold.

Objectives.Objective: Repel the Invasion of Violet Hold
